mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into pay_channel_billing_cycles (pay_channel_id, billing_cycles_id, description, rate) values (#{payChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{billingCyclesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, pay_channel_id, billing_cycles_id, description, rate from pay_channel_billing_cycles
select pcbc.*, dbc.id dbc_id, dbc.name dbc_name from pay_channel_billing_cycles pcbc inner join dictionary_billing_cycles dbc on pcbc.billing_cycles_id=dbc.id where pcbc.id = #{param1}
select pcbc.*, dbc.id dbc_id, dbc.name dbc_name from pay_channel_billing_cycles pcbc inner join dictionary_billing_cycles dbc on pcbc.billing_cycles_id=dbc.id where pcbc.pay_channel_id = #{param1}

select pcbc.*, dbc.id dbc_id, dbc.name dbc_name from pay_channel_billing_cycles pcbc inner join dictionary_billing_cycles dbc on pcbc.billing_cycles_id=dbc.id where pcbc.billing_cycles_id = #{billingCycleId} and pcbc.pay_channel_id = #{payChannelId}
